title: Nestlé
summary: Nestlé S.A. (/ˈnɛsleɪ, -li, -əl/; French: [nɛsle]) is a Swiss multinational food and drink processing conglomerate corporation headquartered in Vevey, Vaud, Switzerland. It is the largest food company in the world, measured by revenue and other metrics, since 2014.[4][5][6][7][8] It ranked No. 64 on the Fortune Global 500 in 2017[9] and No. 33 in the 2016 edition of the Forbes Global 2000 list of largest public companies.[10]
